An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment....
- [Refund and Returns Policy](https://shashaschoice.com/refund_returns/):   Overview Our refund and returns policy lasts 7 days. If 7 days have passed since your purchase, we can’t offer you a refund or exchange. To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging. Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases. Additional non-returnable items: Custom made projects...

- [FAQ by Shasha's Choice](https://shashaschoice.com/faq/): FAQ If you don’t find any useful then contact us with email id November Campaign Refund How long does it take to process a refund? Once we receive the returned item, refunds are processed within 5–7 business days. You’ll receive a confirmation when it’s completed. How will I receive my refund? Refunds are issued to your original payment method. Depending on your bank, it may take 3–5 days for the funds to appear. Can I get a refund if my item is damaged or defective? Yes, if your item arrives damaged or defective, please contact us within 7 days. We’ll...

- [About Us, Understand Shasha's Choice Company](https://shashaschoice.com/about-us/): Shashas’s choice company We believe we can all make a difference. Aesthetic brunch polaroid bespoke, vice kale chips leggings 90’s selfies raw denim. rings Modern and eye-catching lines Inspired by the rebellious spirit of America and the intrigue of unwavering authenticity, R13 launched in Fall 2009. At the forefront of design, R13 cuts avant-garde silhouettes such as the skinny legging and harem pant from Italian and Turkish denim produced in Castelfranco, Italy. The necklace features a delicate chain that gracefully holds a luminous white pearl at its center. The pearl, known for its natural beauty and timeless appeal, is perfectly round with a smooth surface, adding a touch of sophistication and charm. The minimalist yet luxurious design makes this necklace a versatile accessory, perfect for both formal occasions and everyday wear. Click Link for More products
